name: Jobskey Consultancy UK
description:
Jobskey’s primary focus as always is to provide quality service along with various value added services.

Our mission to be a premier information technology staffing company is achieved by:

Delivering real value to our clients by providing top quality technical services and solutions at reasonable rates.

Delivering the best work environment for our consultants and staff.

jobs.title: Java Lead
jobs.description:
Looking for Java Leads with 5+ yrs of experience and Competent in Core Java, Advanced JAVA Programming, J2EE,JSP, Struts, SQL Queries, Database programming, OOP, Object Oriented analysis and design, relational database, SQL and ORM technologies (hibernate).

Requirements:
Strong understanding of design patterns and multi-threading.
Experience working in high performing development teams using agile/ scrum methodologies and tools; various code versioning systems, such as Subversion.
Ability to multi task and switch context to changing priorities in a high dynamic environment and Proficient in troubleshooting skills, especially in complex application stacks.
Experience in Test Driven Development and mobile platform is added advantage."
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Looking for Java Leads with 5+ yrs of experience and Competent in Core Java, Advanced JAVA Programming, J2EE,JSP, Struts, SQL Queries, Database programming, OOP, Object Oriented analysis and design, relational database, SQL and ORM technologies (hibernate).

Requirements:
Strong understanding of design patterns and multi-threading.
Experience working in high performing development teams using agile/ scrum methodologies and tools; various code versioning systems, such as Subversion.
Ability to multi task and switch context to changing priorities in a high dynamic environment and Proficient in troubleshooting skills, especially in complex application stacks.
Experience in Test Driven Development and mobile platform is added advantage."

jobs.title: .Net Developer
jobs.description:
At least 4 years experience in developing applications using Microsoft .NET Framework.
Strong in OOPS and Design Patterns
Developed medium scale Websites using .NET Frameworks.
Experience in .NET Web API and MVC
Experience in SQL Server
Experience in integrating applications with 3rd party solutions using REST and SOAP requests
Implemented Web API and Web Services to expose the data.
Strong in analytical thinking & communication
Ability to troubleshoot the existing application and provide root cause analysis
Team player with good communication
Knowledge in implementing applications using Code First and Model First approaches
Experience in Open Source tools for Web Development
Experience in improving website performance following various factors.
Experience in setting up continuous integration and deployment using any industry standard toolset
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At least 4 years experience in developing applications using Microsoft .NET Framework.
Strong in OOPS and Design Patterns
Developed medium scale Websites using .NET Frameworks.
Experience in .NET Web API and MVC
Experience in SQL Server
Experience in integrating applications with 3rd party solutions using REST and SOAP requests
Implemented Web API and Web Services to expose the data.
Strong in analytical thinking & communication
Ability to troubleshoot the existing application and provide root cause analysis
Team player with good communication
Knowledge in implementing applications using Code First and Model First approaches
Experience in Open Source tools for Web Development
Experience in improving website performance following various factors.
Experience in setting up continuous integration and deployment using any industry standard toolset

jobs.title: React JS Developer
jobs.description:
Minimum 5 yrs of experience in JavaScript framework
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript
Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)
Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Webpack, NPM, etc.
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
A knack for benchmarking and optimization
Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git, SVN
